name: Mediacom Communications Corporation
description: Mediacom Communications Corporation is one of the leading cable television and broadband service providers in the United States, primarily serving small to mid-sized communities. Founded in 1995, Mediacom operates in 22 states, delivering high-speed internet, digital television, and phone services to residential and business customers. The company prides itself on providing reliable service and innovative technology, including its advanced digital video platform and high-speed internet services that cater to the needs of modern consumers. Mediacom is dedicated to bridging the digital divide by investing in infrastructure to enhance internet access in underserved areas. In addition to traditional cable services, Mediacom offers a variety of packages tailored to meet diverse viewing preferences, including on-demand content and high-definition programming. The company’s commitment to customer service is evident in its responsive support teams and community involvement initiatives. Mediacom continues to adapt to the rapidly changing telecommunications landscape through strategic partnerships and investments in next-generation technologies, ensuring that it remains competitive in delivering quality entertainment and connectivity solutions.

faq.question: What services does Mediacom offer?
faq.answer: Mediacom offers cable television, high-speed internet, and digital phone services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Mediacom?
faq.answer: Rocco B. Commisso is the CEO of Mediacom Communications Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Mediacom headquartered?
faq.answer: Mediacom is headquartered in Middletown, New York, USA.
